about_the_game:
Overview

Upgrade your ship and expand your fleet in a thrilling adventure on the infinite seas!
Take a relaxing voyage and enjoy the scenery while listening to the soothing sounds of the ocean, or diligently search for other ships to plunder. Live the life of a sailor on the free seas.
In Sailist, you can control your character in first or third person, and move freely around the interior of a sailing ship. Stop by various towns to buy your favorite ships, ship equipment, clothes for your character, and trade goods. You can even loot other ships if you're prepared enough.

Exploration

Before setting out on a long voyage, players must recruit enough sailors in the harbor and load their ships with enough supplies. During the voyage, they'll need to keep their crew in the right places to maintain speed and manage the ship's condition. But the sea is a dangerous place, and there's no telling what awaits on a long voyage...

Trade

Each port town produces different trade goods, and if you're lucky or complete village requests to raise your contribution level, you can purchase higher quality trade goods at lower prices. Find the towns that buy these goods at high prices and establish a golden trade route. With the profits you earn, buy bigger ships and more ships to carry even more goods and become a successful merchant!

Ship battles

Captain, look! a ship flying a pirate flag is approaching! Order your crew into battle formation and turn your ship to aim your cannons at the enemy first! Order evasive maneuvers for ships in your fleet that are not fit for combat! Veteran sailors who have lived and died with you will be able to aim their cannons well, even if the ship is far away. For rookie sailors you've just hired, command the angle of your cannons and fire at just the right time to get a hit.

Village Building

Discover empty coastal lands, build ports, and construct buildings to create your own village.
Transport building materials to the village, develop it, and secure various advantages.
Strategically utilize your village to efficiently dominate the vast seas!
